source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide, high-angle shot of a video game level. The main gameplay area, consisting of several kitchen platforms, occupies the middle ground of the frame, surrounded by dark water. In the background, dark silhouettes of trees are visible. Two small chef characters are present; one in a red shirt is positioned on a platform in the top right, while another in a blue shirt is on a platform in the bottom center. Overlaid in the foreground are recipe cards at the top, a score in the bottom left, and a timer in the bottom right. During the clip, the blue-shirted chef moves from the center to the right side of the bottom platform, while the red-shirted chef moves from the right side to the center of the top right platform and then back again.
